metadata.name: Stop War
metadata.description:
«Stop War» - looped audio-visual #NFT art with analog modular sound.

Please help Ukraine - my country and people! 

All money from the sale of this collection will go to philanthropy in support of peace and humanitarian aid in Ukraine!


#stopwar #UkrainiansWillResist #standwithUkraine #StrongerTogether #StopPutinNOW #NFTCommunity 


Used tools: 
Software: Cinema 4D.
Hardware:  Zoom LiveTrack L-20R; Modular Synthesizer: Erica Synth -Vawetable VCO, Modulator, PicoSystem III, Octasource; Mutable Instrument - Elements, HappyNerding - FX AID.

 
Video resolution: 1080x1080px
Length: 45 sec
Audio: 44,1kHz Stereo
